thread.title: Roy D. Bruce
thread.title_full: American Advisors Group reviewed by Roy D. Bruce

author: Roy D. Bruce
title: Roy D. Bruce
text: The agent I dealt with Mark Dayton was very through in explaining what reverse morgage entailed and what options were available to me. The whole process from start to finish went as smooth as clock work, making me a very happy and content camper. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend the AAG experience to anyone.
